<break>

107705.「プライベートコンシェルジュを雇うと\n 旅のコンシェルジュと モンスター酒場の:
Hiring a Private Concierge gives you access to certain features of Travel Concierge and Monster Tavern. First, the Private Concierge
will receive the Port Gold and Casino Tokens provided by the Travel Concierge. Bonus Orb and Stamp Orb exchanges will also be available
through the Private Concierge. Please note that the Stamp Orb exchange service is only available to those who are able to train. Some
functions of the Monster Tavern will be available, such as "Take Me With You", "Leave Me With You", "Monster Farm" and "Dress Up
Goods".

107706.「プライベートコンシェルジュに\n プラコンスーツ・青などの 服アイテムを\n:
You can change your private concierge's clothing items (such as Blue Suit) at any time by selecting "Change Clothes" from the "Teach
Yourself How to Act" menu. Please note that if you fire the Private Concierge, the gift will be lost.

107707.「プライベートコンシェルジュに\n 口調の書・甘えん坊などの アイテムを\n 贈:
You can change your tone of voice by giving your private concierge a Tone Book - Sweet, etc. Once you have given your private
concierge a Tone Book, you can change your tone of voice at any time by clicking "Change Tone" under "Teach Yourself How to Behave".
Please note that if you dismiss the Private Concierge, the gift will be lost.

107708.「プライベートコンシェルジュに\n 贈ることができるプレゼントには\n さまざま:
There are many different types of gifts you can give to your Private Concierge. Each gift increases the number of things the Private
Concierge can order you to do. Gifts such as dresses and suits allow you to change into them by selecting "change clothes" from the
"teach me how to behave" option. Bath Set and other items will be used by sometimes when she comes home. You can give
them gifts by talking to the private concierge with a gift in your items. You can give various gifts to your private concierge to
make him or her more like .
